title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

General Considerations:

For Task A, the response must correctly identify an agent of political socialization.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the process of political socialization.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain how political socialization affects a regimeâ€™s stability.

Points for each task are earned independently of each other.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the three tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
